attributes.action: Get out NOW before creating any more crippling taxation on the low paid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the public want you to go now before you can increase any more indirect taxation, we are struggling to survive, you don't have a clue as to how hard YOU have made it for the low paid to live in this country and YOU don't even care. call an election so we can get rid of YOU now ! tax should be based on ability to pay, under YOU we have nothing left, go now before you hurt us any more.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
